dynamicChoiceSets.description: used to pass lookup values of key team members
dynamicChoiceSets.name: recChoice_KeyTeamMembersID

formulas.description: used to pull in the job creator's name on first scrent
formulas.name: forT_JobCreatorName

fields.name: GoText
fields.fieldText: GNG Status is a  {!JobAccountVar.Go_No_Gox__c} – Currently covered by contract

fields.name: NoGoText
fields.fieldText: GNG Status is a {!JobAccountVar.Go_No_Gox__c} – Contract is required before work can be performed

fields.name: Job_Name
fields.helpText: Format: "Account Name - Property Name." This is not sent in the Lead Sheet email. Please ensure your Property Name reflects any Apt or Unit #s you wish the IR Ops team to note.

fields.name: Tax_Exempt
fields.helpText: When check box is checked the customer is tax exempt for this job.

fields.name: Is_this_Job_a_Bid
fields.helpText: Check this box if the job was or will be involved in a bid process.

fields.name: Is_Area_WideEvent
fields.fieldText: Is this Job Related to an Area Wide Event? (AWE)

fields.name: T_M_Rate_Year
fields.fieldText:
T&M Rate Year

{!JobAccountVar.T_M_Year__c}

fields.name: GPO_DisplayText
fields.fieldText: This account has a GPO. If the job should have one, please select it.

fields.name: Cooperative_Purchasing_Vehicle
fields.helpText: Indicates the preferred Cooperative Purchasing Agreement to utilize. Please see Cooperative Purchasing account record in the SF Billing Protocol section.

fields.name: Billing_Entity
fields.helpText: Select the legal entity/sister company that this client should be billed to. This populates onto all jobs associated with this account and informs the Billing team which legal entity's letterhead to use when invoicing this client. If in doubt, select First Onsite.

fields.name: Damage_Description1
fields.helpText: This field is for the description of the damage. Include Store Name, Floor Level or Unit, Suite, Apartment, Building numbers if applicable.

fields.name: Lead_Source_Defining_Points_of_Contacts_Header_Section
fields.fieldText: Lead Source & Defining Points of Contacts

fields.name: Create_Contact1
fields.fieldText: Click here to create New Contact and then click the Create Job Button

screens.name: Tier_5_Screen
screens.label: Tier_5_Screen

fields.name: Tier_5_Message
fields.fieldText: This is a Tier 5 – Do Not Service Account. Do not service without talking to your GM/RDS/Sales Ops team. Please discuss with your leadership group prior to creating any jobs or making any commitments to this customer.

screens.nextOrFinishButtonLabel: Click here to Create the Job

fields.name: Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
Please read the error below. Play close attention to the error after the phrase FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


To fix the errors, click the previous button to go back into the field(s) that need attention. Then, click the Next button to complete the creation of the job.


Thank you!

textTemplates.name: ClaimScript
textTemplates.text: Related to Insurance Claim - Determine if this involves an insurance claim - if so, collect as much insurance information as possible (click checkbox for fields)

textTemplates.description: used for damage descrption screen questions
textTemplates.name: DamageDescriptionScript
textTemplates.text: Damage Description Detail all notes about damage for Operations Team Special Concerns Is there power at the property ? Do you need a generator? Is the property vacant or occupied? Is the property single or multi-level? Has the source of the damage been identified/repaired? Contents Damage Have any contents or personal property been damaged? What was damaged and what is rough estimated value of items? Does anything need to be removed ASAP?

variables.description: Determines if we need to create a contact or not
variables.name: isCreateContact
